mapper.select: select * from pix_article where is_use = "Y" order by pix_idx desc;
select * from pix_article where pix_idx = #{param} and is_use = "Y" order by pix_idx desc;
select * from pix_comment where pix_idx = #{param} and is_use = "Y" order by pix_comment asc;
select * from pix_article where is_use = "Y" and created_by = #{param} order by pix_idx desc;
mapper.insert:
insert into pix_article ( created_by , created_date , pix_image , pix_title , pix_content , pix_tag , is_use , latitude , longitude )
values
( #{created_by} , now() , #{pix_image} , #{pix_title} , #{pix_content} , #{pix_tag} , "Y" , #{latitude} , #{longitude} )
mapper.select: SElECT distinct pix_idx FROM pix_like WHERE pix_like_user = #{param}
SELECT pix_like.pix_idx , count(*) as likeNum FROM pix_like WHERE pix_like.pix_like_user = #{param} GROUP BY pix_like.pix_idx;
select * from pix.fest_login where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
select * from pix.fest_event order by idx desc
select title from pix.fest_ufo WHERE idfest_ufo = #{param}
select * from pix.fest_option where event_idx = #{event_idx} and fest_option_q = #{fest_option_q}
select * from pix.fest_q1 where event_idx = #{param} order by idx desc limit 1;
select * from pix.fest_q2 where event_idx = #{param} order by idx desc limit 1;
select * from pix.fest_q3 where event_idx = #{param} order by idx desc limit 1;
select * from pix.fest_q4 where event_idx = #{param} order by idx desc limit 1;
select * from pix.fest_q5 where event_idx = #{param} order by idx desc limit 1;
select * from pix.fest_q6 where event_idx = #{param} order by idx desc limit 1;
select * from pix.fest_q7 where event_idx = #{param} order by idx desc limit 1;
select * from pix.fest_event_info where event_idx = #{param} order by idx desc;
select * from pix.fest_event_notice where event_idx = #{param} order by idx desc;
SELECT * FROM `pix`.`fest_ufo_notice` WHERE `fest_ufo_notice`.`idfest_ufo_notice` = #{param} AND `fest_ufo_notice`.`is_use` = 'Y'
SELECT para FROM fest_ufo WHERE idfest_ufo = #{param}
SELECT q1_option as fest_option_content FROM pix.fest_ufo_q1 WHERE para = #{param} and is_use = 'Y' ORDER BY orderq asc
SELECT q2_option as fest_option_content FROM fest_ufo_q2 WHERE para = #{param} and is_use = 'Y' ORDER BY orderq asc
SELECT q3_option as fest_option_content FROM fest_ufo_q3 WHERE para = #{param} and is_use = 'Y' ORDER BY orderq asc
SELECT q4_option as fest_option_content FROM fest_ufo_q4 WHERE para = #{param} and is_use = 'Y' ORDER BY orderq asc
SELECT q5_option as fest_option_content FROM fest_ufo_q5 WHERE para = #{param} and is_use = 'Y' ORDER BY orderq asc
SELECT * FROM pix.fest_ufo_questions WHERE para = #{param} and is_use = 'Y' ORDER BY orderq asc;
mapper.update: UPDATE pix.fest_ufo_notice SET is_use='N' WHERE idfest_ufo_notice=#{fest_id};
mapper.select:
SELECT
A.title , A.logo , A.main_image , A.event_date , A.event_long_description , A.info_info_pic , A.info_info_text , A.info_hist_pic , A.info_hist_text , A.info_program_pic , A.info_program_text , A.info_location_pic , A.info_location_text , A.info_contact_pic , A.info_contact_text , A.q1_img , A.q2_img , A.q3_img , A.q4_img , A.q5_img , A.q6_img , A.q_coupon_img , A.q_coupon_txt , A.q_coupon_txt2 , A.q_coupon_txt3 , A.q_graphic
FROM pix.fest_ufo A
WHERE A.para = #{param};
mapper.insert:
insert into fest_sns_log ( uid , first_name , last_name , email , log_time , sns_return , sns_type , sns_ip )
values
( #{uid} , #{first_name} , #{last_name} , #{email} , now() , #{sns_return} , #{sns_type} , #{sns_ip} )

insert into fest_news_letter ( news_letter_email , news_letter_ip , news_letter_date )
values
( #{news_letter_email} , #{news_letter_ip} , now() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM fest_ufo_questions WHERE para = #{param} and is_use = 'Y' ORDER BY orderq asc
SELECT * FROM fest_ufo_q WHERE para = #{param} and is_use = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fest_ufo_answer ( q1_a , q2_a , q3_a , q4_a , q5_a , q6_a , q7_a , uid_a , first_name_a , last_name_a , email_a , sns_type_a , time_log , ip_log , access_token_a , para , pic_lat , pic_lon , sns_msg , sns_return , sns_gid ) VALUES ( #{q1_a} , #{q2_a} , #{q3_a} , #{q4_a} , #{q5_a} , #{q6_a} , #{q7_a} , #{uid_a} , #{first_name_a} , #{last_name_a} , #{email_a} , #{sns_type_a} , now() , #{ip_log} , #{access_token_a} , #{para} , #{pic_lat} , #{pic_lon} , #{sns_msg} , #{sns_return} , #{sns_gid} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM fest_ufo_answer WHERE uid_a = #{uid_a} and para = #{para} ORDER BY id desc LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM pix.ufo_go WHERE go_para = #{param} AND ufo_go_type = 'go'
SELECT * FROM pix.ufo_go WHERE go_para = #{param} AND ufo_go_type = 'qr'
SELECT * FROM pix.ufo_go_record WHERE para = #{param}

select a.ufo_gid, a.ufo_go_type, c.go_content, a.ufo_image from ufo_go_record a left join (select ufo_gid, max(id) bid from ufo_go_record where user_uid =#{user_uid} and para = #{para} group by ufo_gid) b on a.id = b.bid left join pix.ufo_go c on a.ufo_gid = c.ufo_gid where b.bid is not null
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pix.ufo_go_record ( first_name, last_name, ufo_date, ufo_image, para, ufo_go_num, user_uid, ufo_go_type, image_lat, image_alt, ufo_gid, login_type ) VALUES ( #{first_name}, #{last_name}, now(), #{ufo_image}, #{para}, #{ufo_go_num}, #{user_uid}, #{ufo_go_type}, #{image_lat}, #{image_alt}, #{ufo_gid}, #{login_type} )

INSERT INTO pix.ufo_go ( go_alt, go_lat, go_para, go_content, ufo_go_date, ufo_go_type, ufo_gid, go_desc, go_image ) VALUES ( #{go_alt }, #{go_lat }, #{go_para }, #{go_content }, #{ufo_go_date }, #{ufo_go_type }, #{ufo_gid }, #{go_desc }, #{go_image } );
INSERT INTO pix.ufo_share ( idufo_share, para, uid, share_return, result_type, share_time ) VALUES ( #{idufo_share}, #{para}, #{uid}, #{share_return}, #{result_type}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT para FROM fest_ufo
SELECT ufo_date, first_name, last_name, ufo_image, para, user_uid, ufo_gid from ufo_go_record where ufo_date > date_sub(NOW(), interval 3 hour) and para = #{param} order by rand() limit 10
mapper.insert: INSERT into UfoWinnerRecord ( winner_time, first_name, last_name, ufo_image, para, user_uid, ufo_gid ) VALUES ( now(), #{first_name}, #{last_name}, #{ufo_image}, #{para}, #{user_uid}, #{ufo_gid} )
mapper.update: update UfoWinnerRecord set winner_like = winner_like + 1 where idUfoWinnerRecord = #{param}
mapper.select: SELECT winner_like FROM pix.UfoWinnerRecord where idUfoWinnerRecord = #{param}

SELECT case count(0) when (SELECT count(0) 'user' FROM pix.ufo_go where go_para = #{para} and ufo_go_type = 'go' and ufo_gid in (SELECT ufo_gid FROM pix.ufo_go_record where user_uid = #{user_uid})) then '1' else '0' end FROM pix.ufo_go where go_para = #{para} and ufo_go_type = 'go'
